City-of-Zurast.name: City of Zurast
description: The capital city of the Archduchy of Zurast, the city was once a small city-state in eastern Ulfwyst. Over the last century and a half, through military conflict and political alliances, the archdukes of Zurast have successfully expanded and consolidated their holdings into a respected regional power.

Location: The City of Zurast is situated on the Sulas river, which flows south from the Kelishan Highlands into the Bay of Claws. Located roughly 8 miles from upriver from the Bay of Claws, the city is one of the most important ports in southern Ulfwyst. Even before expanding into a regional power, the city-state served as a major hub of trade and culture in the region, linking the states of Navolin, Tovanis (Istagen), Cibrin, Lemuria and Sedobia.

Frecyra.name: Frecyra
description: The capital city of Navolin, Frecyra is one of the largest cities in Ulfwyst. The city has several nicknames including: "the Fortress City","the City of Statues", and "the City of the Tower".

Kilurus.name: Kilurus
description: The capital city of Lemuria, Kilurus is located on the eastern side of the Strait of Krigere.

Irulek.name: Irulek
description: The capital city of the Kaeldrin Sanctum, Irulek is located in north-central Ulfwyst on the Ponerno river, just a few miles away from the beginning of the Sullen Fen.

Lyrannore.name: Lyrannore
description: Lyrannore is the capital city of the Ildroun Vale.

Enira.name: Enira
leaders: Han Darga Vaburk of Clan Godak
description: Enira is the capital city of the Realm of Cibrin.

Khezrabad.name: Khezrabad
description: Khezrabad is the capital city of the Kingdom of Abbasyr.
